state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! First thing I need you to do is to unlock the spherical hatch inside the laundry place. After that, make it so that the spherical hatch inside the laundry place is ajar. After that, take a trip north. Next, travel north. If you can finish that, venture east. Following that, go north. After that, go to the west. And then, go to the north. Next, attempt to head east. After that, move east. Then, go south. Once you manage that, make an attempt to head south. And then, head east. And then, lift the insect from the floor of the closet. Got that? Good! -= Laundry Place =- You are in a normal kind of place. That is to say, you're in a laundry place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You can see an opened safe, which looks typical, here. What a letdown! The safe is empty! You can see a rack. But the thing is empty. Hm. Oh well There is a closed spherical hatch leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. > -= Laundry Place =-0/1

admissible_commands: unlock spherical hatch with spherical latchkey

action: unlock spherical hatch with spherical latchkey
next_state: You unlock spherical hatch. > -= Laundry Place =-0/2

admissible_commands: lock spherical hatch with spherical latchkey

state: You unlock spherical hatch. > -= Laundry Place =-0/2

admissible_commands: lock spherical hatch with spherical latchkey

next_state: You open spherical hatch. > -= Laundry Place =-0/3

state: You open spherical hatch. > -= Laundry Place =-0/3
next_state: -= Salon =- You are in a salon. A standard one. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a portmanteau. A closed dresser, which looks typical, is right there by you. You can make out a mantle. The mantle appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well There is an open spherical hatch leading south. There is an open gate leading north. > -= Salon =-0/4

state: -= Salon =- You are in a salon. A standard one. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a portmanteau. A closed dresser, which looks typical, is right there by you. You can make out a mantle. The mantle appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well There is an open spherical hatch leading south. There is an open gate leading north. > -= Salon =-0/4
next_state: -= Cubicle =- You have stumbled into a cubicle. Not the cubicle you'd expect. No, this is a cubicle. There is an open gate leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is a passkey on the floor. > -= Cubicle =-0/5
